data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Monogamy is always assumed to be part of our nature, but if you look at the facts that may not be the whole story. True, society ____ a ____ of ____ on ____, ____ if ____ were ____ would ____ be ____ much ____? In fact, many other cultures successfully practice polygamy, and all participants seem to be fairly content.
data.partBlankContent: Monogamy is always assumed to be part of our nature, but if you look at the facts that may not be the whole story. True, society pla___ a l__ of va___ on i_, b__ if i_ were inhe____ would th___ be s_ much infid_____? In fact, many other cultures successfully practice polygamy, and all participants seem to be fairly content.
data.fullContent: Monogamy is always assumed to be part of our nature, but if you look at the facts that may not be the whole story. True, society placed a lot of value on it, but if it were inherent would there be so much infidelity? In fact, many other cultures successfully practice polygamy, and all participants seem to be fairly content.
data.answer: 一夫一妻制一直被认为是人类本性的一部分，但如果你看看事实，就会发现这并不是全部。诚然，社会很重视婚姻，但如果婚姻是与生俱来的，会有那么多不忠吗？事实上，许多其他文化成功地实行了一夫多妻制，而且所有的参与者似乎都相当满足。
